name: setup commands
status constructor
average output and update masters
attract_screen - main
format:
<script>
    (function(scope) {
        scope.$watch('msg.payload', function(data) {
            if(data == "show") {
                var iframe = document.createElement('iframe');
                iframe.src = "../../attract.html";
                iframe.id = "attract";
                document.body.appendChild(iframe);
                iframe.contentWindow.addEventListener('click', function() {
                    scope.send({payload: "allOn", topic: "sys"});
                });
                iframe.style.display = "block";
                iframe.style.zIndex = 9999;
            } else if(data == "hide") {
                var iframe = document.getElementById('attract');
                iframe.removeEventListener('click', function() {});
                iframe.parentNode.removeChild(iframe);
            }
        });
    })(scope);
</script>
<style>
    iframe {
        position: absolute;
        top: 0px;
        left: 0px;
        width: 600px;
        height: 1024px;
        display: block;
        z-index: 9999;
        border: none;
    }
</style>

name: attract_screen - cool
format:
<script>
    (function(scope) {
        scope.$watch('msg.payload', function(data) {
            if(data == "show") {
                window.location.href = "./#!/0"
            } else if(data == "hide") {
                console.log('system on');
            }
        });
    })(scope);
</script>
